Description: A modern, simplified job board and candidate resourcing tool designed to enable employers and staffing agencies to make HUGE monthly savings!
Name: Candidate Hub

Methods.Name: Get Contact
Methods.Description: Get a contact by their Id.

Methods.Name: Update Contact
Methods.Description: Allows you to update the contact that you select.

Methods.Name: Delete Contact
Methods.Description: Delete the contact details for the specified ID.

Methods.Name: Get Contact By Email
Methods.Description: Get a contact by email address. Contains an action condition for found status.

Methods.Name: List Updated Contacts
Methods.Description: List all contacts that have been updated since last successful run date.

Methods.Name: List New Contacts
Methods.Description: List all contacts that have been created since last successful run date.
